summary: Completed testing of SparkMate/PrideConnect LGBTQ+ dating app Pro features: message deletion and read receipts. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend has navigation/session issues preventing complete chat testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Session not persisting properly - users get redirected to login page when navigating to chat/DMs
Direct navigation to chat URLs redirects to /discover instead of maintaining chat route

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access chat functionality through UI navigation - DMs button not working properly

issues: Beautiful rainbow gradient background implemented correctly

passed_tests: Backend: DELETE /api/messages/{message_id} - fails for non-Pro users with 403
Backend: DELETE /api/messages/{message_id} - succeeds for Pro users
Backend: GET /api/messages/{match_id} - filters out deleted messages
Backend: GET /api/messages/{match_id} - adds read_at timestamp when marking as read
Backend: Message ownership check - users can only delete own messages
Frontend: App loads correctly with PrideConnect branding
Frontend: Login page accessible and functional
Frontend: Beautiful LGBTQ+ rainbow gradient design

success_percentage.frontend: 40% - UI loads but chat navigation blocked by routing issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend routing/navigation issues: 1) Session persistence when navigating between routes, 2) DMs/Chat navigation not working properly, 3) Direct chat URL access redirecting incorrectly. Backend Pro features are fully functional.
